name: KKLAnimatedLightbox
summary: Treat the eyes of your user by presenting popover content with slick animation in your iOS apps.
description: KKLAnimatedLightbox is a modal view controller for presenting popover content using slick animations. It's powered using a combination of the iOS7 view controller transitions API and Facebook's [pop](https://github.com/facebook/pop) animation library. It comes with a number of out-of-the-box animations and is easily extended.
